3.2.0.change: Added new option on event creation to make the event private
3.2.0.description: This enables users to make an event not show in the events channel, but gives them a private channel for coordinating as well as notifications and join/leave commands

3.2.0.change: Improved `/event join` to be more descriptive when altering other event members
3.2.0.description: Adjusted verbage to make more sense and added "by <user>" to the message so you can see who adjusted the membership
When creating a new event, if you provide a date in the past, the bot will stop event creation and provide helpful feedback on your date format
When updating the bot, it will check if there are release notes associated with the change and publish them automatically to a channel
